name: Baxcalibur
flavorText: This Pokémon blasts cryogenic air out from its mouth. This air can instantly freeze even liquid-hot lava.

previous.name: Arctibax
previous.flavorText: Arctibax freezes the air around it, protecting its face with an ice mask and turning its dorsal fin into a blade of ice.

next.name: Gimmighoul
next.flavorText: This Pokémon was born inside a treasure chest about 1,500 years ago. It sucks the life-force out of scoundrels who try to steal the treasure.

pokemon.name: Frigibax
pokemon.flavorText: Frigibax absorbs heat through its dorsal fin and converts the heat into ice energy. The higher the temperature, the more energy Frigibax stores.

pokemon.name: Arctibax
pokemon.flavorText: Arctibax freezes the air around it, protecting its face with an ice mask and turning its dorsal fin into a blade of ice.
